project.teaser: The European Researchers Night (ERN) in Slovakia is the biggest science popularisation event for broad audience taking place every year. Since 2007 it is established science event that brings interactive programme and science and innovation closer to citizens and ordinary...
project.objective:
The European Researchers Night (ERN) in Slovakia is the biggest science popularisation event for broad audience taking place every year.
Since 2007 it is established science event that brings interactive programme and science and innovation closer to citizens and ordinary people. The ERN traditionally takes place in September in unusual places - in shopping centres and public spaces. Innovative formats, direct interactions with scientists and informal setting of the project involves hundreds of researchers and it attracts thousands of visitors every year. Science show within the ERN takes place in unusual places shopping centres and an old market hall - where it also attracts random visitors and people who normally would not be interested in the topic. Through an interactive programme it invites visitors to participate in science experiments, demonstrations, discussions and lectures and provides an opportunity for dialogue and exchange between science community and the Slovak society.
The ERN focuses on young people and students, and it presents them science, and opportunities it provides thus motivating them to embark on research career. The science festival appeals to young audience and showcases research in an unconventional and entertaining way.
project.title: European Researchers Night 2022-2023

article.title: Celebrating science and innovation in Slovakia

result.title: Report on the Activities during the nigh 2022
result.description: Report on the Activities during the Night will be prepared summarising all the activities that were organised including statistics and numbers of participants It will include complete list of all the MSCA and EU funded projects fellows involved in the event with name surname and projects grant agreement number Report will also comprise photos from all festival venues and a makingofvideo from the ERN in Bratislava Projects summary brochure will also be worked out consisting of the description of all festival activities photos statistics list of stands in each city and list of media outputs SOVVA as the lead beneficiary will be responsible for the report preparation with the inputs from partners

result.title: Report on the Management 2022
result.description: Reports on the management of both editions of the ERN will be prepared in the 8th month of the project It will include the overall assessment of management procedures administrative financial technical and significant deviations if any with the explanation and their justification At the end of reporting period Periodic technical report will be prepared

result.title: Report on the Researchers at schools activites 2023
result.description: Report will be prepared by lead beneficiary in the 20th month consisting of overall assessment of the activity with numbers of participating schools and researchers and other statistics It will also include photos of kits that will be prepared within Scientific Courier as well as photos made by teachers while doing the experiments with students Activity Visit your schoolGet to know your scientist will be summarised and assessed Photos provided by teachers from presentations will be included in the report

result.title: Report on the Awareness Campaign 2022
result.description: Report on the Awareness campaign will be worked out by lead beneficiary with the outputs from project partners Reports will summarise the actions statistics media feedback and hits overall outreach of the campaign and it will be accompanied by samples of promotional materials

result.title: Report on the Awareness campaign 2023
result.description: Report on the Awareness campaign will be worked out by lead beneficiary with the outputs from project partners Reports will summarise the actions statistics media feedback and hits overall outreach of the campaign and it will be accompanied by samples of promotional materials

result.description: Report on the Activities during the Night will be prepared summarising all the activities that were organised including statistics and numbers of participants It will include complete list of all the MSCA and EU funded projects fellows involved in the event with name surname and projects grant agreement number Report will also comprise photos from all festival venues and a makingofvideo from the ERN in Bratislava Projects summary brochure will also be worked out consisting of the description of all festival activities photos statistics list of stands in each city and list of media outputs SOVVA as the lead beneficiary will be responsible for the report preparation with the inputs from partners

result.description: Report will be prepared by lead beneficiary in the 8th month consisting of overall assessment of the activity with numbers of participating schools and researchers and other statistics It will also include photos of kits that will be prepared within Scientific Courier as well as photos made by teachers while doing the experiments with students Activity Visit your schoolGet to know your scientist will be summarised and assessed Photos provided by teachers from presentations will be included in the report

result.title: Report on the Management 2023
result.description: Reports on the management of both editions of the ERN will be prepared in the 20th month of the project It will include the overall assessment of management procedures administrative financial technical and significant deviations if any with the explanation and their justification At the end of reporting period Periodic technical report will be prepared

result.title: Report on the Impact Assessment 2023
result.description: Impact assessment report will include qualitative and quantitative data of the event number of responses tools used main trends popularity of the programme and activities It will also include main conclusions from the responses and analysis of the data from both questionnaires which will evaluate the overall satisfaction of visitors and researchers as well as include their recommendations and suggestions The report will also involve samples of both questionnaires in English It will also involve feedbacks from researchers from the Researchers at school activity that will be collected throughout the year via direct communication email

result.description: Impact assessment report will include qualitative and quantitative data of the event number of responses tools used main trends popularity of the programme and activities It will also include main conclusions from the responses and analysis of the data from both questionnaires which will evaluate the overall satisfaction of visitors and researchers as well as include their recommendations and suggestions The report will also involve samples of both questionnaires in English It will also involve feedbacks from researchers from the Researchers at school activity that will be collected throughout the year via direct communication email

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 2 - ERN 2022-2023 SVK (European Researchers Night 2022-2023)
result.teaser: The European Researchers Night (ERN) is the biggest science popularisation festival in Slovakia held annually since 2007. It usually takes place in five cities across the country, with a number of accompanying events in whole Slovakia. Every year it attracts tens of thousands...

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
